page.title: 04A DAY IN MY LIFE by P.Quinn
page.content: On school mornings I wake up at 7.30am go downstairs and make my breakfast and eat a cereal called Cornflakes.I get my clothes on and I pack my bag,then I brush my teeth and I go to school. At 9.00am we walk into school and sit down.We do reading and sums,then we walk into the hall for assembly.In assembly we sing and our Headmaster tells us stories.We come out of assembly and we have a break,when we can go outside and run about or play games.When we hear the bell ringing we walk into school and do some more work.At 12.00 noon we have lunch after which we can play until 1.15pm,then the bell rings to begin lessons.We do mental tests,after which we will do either art,topic or P.E.until school ends at 3.30pm.I go home, eat my tea, then play or watch TV until I go to bed at 9.45pm.
